attributes.action: Take legal action against China in placing muslims in concentration camps.
attributes.additional_details: We want the UK to take legal action against their ideological wrongdoings as it threatens human cultural rights.
attributes.background: The Xinjiang region China holds muslims in concentration camps where they are forced to eat pork, alcohol and denounce their religion. This revokes their human rights &Though it may not affect the UK, it may result in a political & social unrest as their ideological expansion may effect us later on.
